Package oop.simplebankapp.model

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.simplebankapp.model.Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DayToDayAccount, PayrollAccount, SavingsAccount
    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    The Account class is an abstract representation of a bank account.
